# UITitlebarTitleVisibility.hidden

**Case**

A state indicating that the title isn’t visible in the title bar.

## Declaration

```swift
case hidden
```

## Visibility states

- **UITitlebarTitleVisibility.visible**: A state indicating that the title is visible in the title bar.
